articles.description: In the most recent FIH rankings, the Indian men's hockey team moved up two spots to fourth as a result of its exceptional back-to-back victories over world champions Germany and Australia in the Pro League games in Rourkela. India significantly overtook Austr…
articles.content:
After losing back-to-back games to India, Germany, who had held the top slot after winning the World Cup in Odisha in January, fell two spots to third place.
